V03vinv08_u:2: sāketena hi kasyacid vitaritaṃ marditaṃ (276r1 = GBM 6.864)
V03vinv08_u:3: ca kālena pudgalo mātṛkāpadāny akṛtena viṃśatiḥ karaṇīyena dvādaśikā
V03vinv08_u:6: kardame uṣṇena klāntānāṃ cīvaraṃ tatra sammatam* // //
V03vinv08_u:7: Kaṭhina-v 1. buddho bhagavāṃ śrāvastyāṃ varṣā upagato jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
V03vinv08_u:8_0: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ sākete varṣopagatās trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām
V03vinv08_u:8_1: atyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ bahutṛṇe bahukardame uṣṇena
V03vinv08_u:8_2: klāmyantaḥ svedaparyākulīkṛtaśarīrā yena śrāvastīṃ tena cārikāṃ carantaḥ śrāvastīm
V03vinv08_u:8_3: anuprāptāḥ atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena
V03vinv08_u:8_4: bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ
V03vinv08_u:10: Kaṭhina-v 2. dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavanta āgantukān bhikṣūn anayā pratisaṃmodanayā pratisaṃmodante /
V03vinv08_u:12_0: kutra vā stha varṣā uṣitā iti pratisaṃmodate bhagavān āgantukān bhikṣūn anayā pratisaṃmodanayā
V03vinv08_u:12_1: sukhaṃ sparśaṃ varṣā nayā kuto yūyaṃ bhikṣava etarhy āgacchatha kutra vā stha varṣā
V03vinv08_u:12_2: uṣitāḥ te kathayaṃti sāketād vayaṃ bhadant';
V03vinv08_u:13_0: etarhy āgacchāma sākete vā sma varṣā uṣitāḥ kaccid yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sākete sukhaṃ
V03vinv08_u:13_1: sparśaṃ varṣā uṣitā na vā stha klāntāḥ piṇḍakena tathyaṃ vayaṃ bhadanta [Matsumura_189]
V03vinv08_u:13_2: sāketa sukhaṃ sparśaṃ varṣā uṣitā na vā smaḥ klāntāḥ piṇḍakenāpi tu vayaṃ samādāya
V03vinv08_u:13_3: pātracīvaraṃ bahutṛṇe bahukardame uṣṇena klāmyantaḥ svedaparyākulīkṛtaśarīrā janapadacārikāṃ
V03vinv08_u:15_0: klāmyanti bata me śrāvakāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ bahutṛṇe bahukardame uṣṇena klāmyanti
V03vinv08_u:15_1: svedaparyākulīkṛtaśarīrā janapadacārikāṃ caranto yanv ahaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sparśavihārārthaṃ
V03vinv08_u:15_2: dātrīṇāṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogārthaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ kaṭhinam anujānīyaṃ /
V03vinv08_u:16_0: yasmāt paṃcānuśaṃsāḥ kaṭhināstare na daśāhaparamaṃ na māsaparamaṃ na rātrivipravāsāḥ
V03vinv08_u:16_1: sāntarottareṇa cīvareṇa janapadacārikāṃ [Matsumura_190] prakramaṇaṃ yāvadaptaṃ vikalpitacīvaradhāraṇam iti /
V03vinv08_u:18_0: na gaṇabhojanaṃ na [Matsumura_191] paraṃparabhojanaṃ na kuleṣv ānimantritacārikā
V03vinv08_u:18_1: yāvadāptaṃ cīvaraparyeṣaṇaṃ [Matsumura_192] kārtikān māsād yāvat phālguno māso atrāntarāt
V03vinv08_u:18_2: sāstṛtakaṭhinānāṃ lābha iti viditvā bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
V03vinv08_u:19_0: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo 'nujānāmi bhikṣūṇāṃ sparśavihārārthaṃ dātrīṇāṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogārthaṃ
V03vinv08_u:19_1: varṣoṣitair bhikṣubhiḥ kaṭhinam āstartavyaṃ yasmāt paṃcānuśaṃsāḥ kaṭhine na daśāhaparamaṃ
V03vinv08_u:20: Kaṭhina-v 4. uktaṃ bhagavatā kaṭhinam āstartavyam iti bhikṣavo na jānate katham [Matsumura_193] āstartavyam iti /
V03vinv08_u:22_0: yad varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpadyate tasmād āstartavyaṃ evaṃ ca punar
V03vinv08_u:22_1: āstartavyaṃ pūrvavat* sāmagryam ārocayitavyaṃ idaṃ cīvaraṃ varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya
V03vinv08_u:22_2: cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ yadi saṃghasyābhirucitam anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam (276v1 = GBM 6.865)
V03vinv08_u:24_0: tataḥ paścād aparasmin divase śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣtavācikayā
V03vinv08_u:24_1: bhikṣūṃ [Matsumura_194] samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā
V03vinv08_u:25: Kaṭhina-v 5. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam abhirucitaṃ anena cīvareṇa kaṭhinam āstarituṃ /
V03vinv08_u:26_0: yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt prakrāmantaḥ [Matsumura_195] purāṇacīvarāṇāṃ apy avipravāso
V03vinv08_u:26_1: bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānāṃ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho
V03vinv08_u:26_2: yat saṃghaḥ idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmanyetānena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:26_3: āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt* prakrāmantaḥ purāṇacīvarāṇām apy avipravāso
V03vinv08_u:26_4: bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānām ity eṣā jñaptiḥ //
V03vinv08_u:28_0: Kaṭhina-v 6. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ
V03vinv08_u:28_1: saṃpannaḥ saṃghasya cābhirucitaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kartuṃ tat saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārthaṃ
V03vinv08_u:28_2: saṃmanyate anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt
V03vinv08_u:28_3: prakrāmataḥ purāṇacīvarakāṇām apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānāṃ [Matsumura_196]
V03vinv08_u:28_4: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmantum anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya
V03vinv08_u:28_5: kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt prakramataḥ purāṇacīvarakāṇām apy
V03vinv08_u:28_6: avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānāṃ sa tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ saṃmataḥ
V03vinv08_u:28_7: saṃghena idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārtham anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati
V03vinv08_u:28_8: yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt* prakrāmataḥ purāṇacīvarakāṇām apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati
V03vinv08_u:28_9: prāg eva navakānāṃ kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīṃ evam etad dhārayāmi
V03vinv08_u:29_0: Kaṭhina-v 7. tataḥ paścāt kaṭhināstārako bhikṣuḥ saṃmantavyaḥ paṃcabhir dharmaiḥ
V03vinv08_u:29_1: samanvāgataḥ kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ
V03vinv08_u:29_2: katamaiḥ paṃcabhiḥ avarṣiko varṣachinnakaḥ [Matsumura_197] paścimakāṃ varṣām upagato
V03vinv08_u:29_3: anyatra varṣoṣitaḥ śikṣādattakaḥ apare api paṃca na saṃmantavyāḥ pārivāsika mūlapārivāsika
V03vinv08_u:29_4: mānāpya mūlamānāpyacāra utkṣiptakaḥ apare paṃca na saṃmantavyā cchandād gacchati
V03vinv08_u:29_5: dveṣāṃ mohād bhayād gacchati āstṛtaṃ cānāstṛtaṃ kaṭhinaṃ na jānāti :
V03vinv08_u:30_0: paṃcabhis tu dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur asaṃmataś ca saṃmantavyaḥ
V03vinv08_u:30_1: saṃmataś ca nāvakāśayitavyaḥ katamaiḥ paṃcabhiḥ na cchandād gacchati na dveṣān na
V03vinv08_u:30_2: mohān na bhayād gacchati āstṛtānāstṛtaṃ ca kaṭhinaṃ jānāti
V03vinv08_u:31_0: Kaṭhina-v 8. evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃmantavyaḥ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā pūrvavad [Matsumura_198]
V03vinv08_u:31_1: yāvad utsāhayitavyaḥ utsahase tvam evaṃnāmā saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstartum iti saced
V03vinv08_u:32: tataḥ paścād ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam*
V03vinv08_u:33_0: Kaṭhina-v 9a. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ayam evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur utsahate
V03vinv08_u:33_1: saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstartuṃ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho (277r1 = GBM 6.866)
V03vinv08_u:34: yat saṃghaḥ evaṃnāmānaṃ kaṭhināstārakaṃ saṃmanyeta evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstarakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyatīti eṣā jñaptiḥ evaṃ ca karma kartavyaṃ
V03vinv08_u:36_0: Kaṭhina-v 9b. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ ayam evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstāraka utsahe saṃghasya
V03vinv08_u:36_1: kaṭhinam āstartuṃ tat saṃgha evaṃnāmānaṃ kaṭhināstārakaṃ saṃmanyeta ayam evaṃnāmā
V03vinv08_u:36_2: kaṭhināstarakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate evaṃnāmānaṃ
V03vinv08_u:36_3: kaṭhināstārakaṃ saṃmantuṃ evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati
V03vinv08_u:36_4: te tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ saṃmataḥ saṃghena evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakaḥ saṃghasya
V03vinv08_u:36_5: kaṭhinam āstariṣyati kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tuṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi
V03vinv08_u:37_0: Kaṭhina-v 10. tataḥ kaṭhināstārakasya bhikṣor jñaptyā kaṭhinaṃ āstaritavyaṃ [Matsumura_200]
V03vinv08_u:37_1: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃghena kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmatam ayaṃ caivaṃnāmā
V03vinv08_u:37_2: kaṭhināstārako bhikṣuḥ saṃmataḥ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho
V03vinv08_u:37_3: yat saṃghaḥ idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārtham evaṃnāmno bhikṣor anupradadyād ity eṣā jñaptiḥ
V03vinv08_u:38_0: Kaṭhina-v 11. kaṭhināstārakasyāhaṃ bhikṣor āsamudācārikāṃ dharmāṃ prajñapayiṣyāmi
V03vinv08_u:38_1: kaṭhināstārakena bhikṣuṇā kaṭhinena sarvatra pūrvaṃgamena bhavitavyam* dhāvatā vitaratā
V03vinv08_u:38_2: cchindatā sīvatā raṃjayatā antato dvau trayo vā sūcīpadakā dātavyā dvau trayo vā
V03vinv08_u:39: Kaṭhina-v 12. tataḥ paścād āśvayujamāse śuklapakṣapaṃcadaśyāṃ ārocayitavyam* :
V03vinv08_u:41_0: yuṣmābhiḥ svakasvakāni cīvarāṇi pratyuddhartavyāni iti tataḥ kaṭhināstārakeṇa [Matsumura_202]
V03vinv08_u:41_1: bhikṣuṇā kaṭhinaṃ gandhapuṣpānvitaṃ surabhidhūpadhūpitaṃ kṛtvā śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ
V03vinv08_u:41_2: kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣtavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite
V03vinv08_u:41_3: vṛddhānte sthāpayitavyaṃ tato vṛddhānte sthivā kaṭhinaṃ gṛhītvā vaktavyaṃ
V03vinv08_u:42_0: Kaṭhina-v 13. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃghena kaṭhinaṃ saṃmatam ahaṃ
V03vinv08_u:42_1: caivaṃnāmā bhikṣuḥ kaṭhināstārakaḥ so 'ham evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakas tena cīvareṇa
V03vinv08_u:43_0: evaṃ dvir api tṛr api tata āstīrya saṃghasthavirasya purastāt sthitvā evaṃ vaktavyaṃ
V03vinv08_u:43_1: samanvāhara sthavira idaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃghena kaṭhinaṃ [Matsumura_203] saṃmatam ahaṃ
V03vinv08_u:43_2: caivaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakas tan mayā anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstṛtam iti
V03vinv08_u:44_0: Kaṭhina-v 14. tena vaktavyaṃ sādhv āstṛtaṃ suṣṭhv āstṛtaṃ yo 'tra lābhas cānuśaṃsaś
V03vinv08_u:44_1: ca so 'smākam iti evaṃ dvir api tṛr api yāvat saṃghanavakasya sarvair vaktavyaṃ sādhv
V03vinv08_u:44_2: āstṛtaṃ suṣṭhv āstṛtaṃ yo 'tra lābhaś cānuśaṃsaś ca so 'smākam iti
V03vinv08_u:45_0: Kaṭhina-v 15. kaṭhināstārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā kaṭhinaṃ gṛhītvā na prasrāvakuṭiṃ na varcaskuṭiṃ
V03vinv08_u:45_1: na dhūmāgāraṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nābhyavakāśe sthātavyaṃ na bahiḥsīmāṃ gantavyaṃ saced
V03vinv08_u:45_2: gacchati na tasyāṃ vastavyaṃ [Matsumura_204] kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur yathāprajñaptān
V03vinv08_u:45_3: āsamudācārikāṃ dharmān na samādāya vartate sātisāro bhavati
V03vinv08_u:46_0: Kaṭhina-v 16. tataḥ kaṭhināstārakena bhikṣuṇā phālgunamāse śuklapakṣapaṃcadaśyāṃ
V03vinv08_u:46_1: punar ārocayitavyaṃ śvā āyuṣmantaḥ kaṭhinam uddhariṣyāmi yūyaṃ svakasvakāni cīvarāṇy adhitiṣṭhateti /
V03vinv08_u:47: yaś ca tatra lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ sa saṃghena bhājayitavyaḥ //
V03vinv08_u:48: Kaṭhina-v 17. āyuśmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati /
V03vinv08_u:49: katīnāṃ bhadanta kaṭhinam anāstṛtaṃ pañcānām upāliṃ avarṣikasya varṣācchinnakasya paścimakāṃ (277v1 = GBM 6.867)
V03vinv08_u:50: varṣāṃ upagatasya anyatra varṣopagatasya tasmiṃ kaṭhina āstīryamāṇe asaṃmukhībhūtasya /
V03vinv08_u:51: apareṣām api paṃcānām anāstṛtaṃ pārivāsikasya paryuṣitaparivāsasya mānāpyacārikasya caritamānāpyasya śikṣādattakasya ca
V03vinv08_u:54: pañcānām upālin avarṣikasya varṣācchinnakasya paścimakāṃ varṣām upagatasyānyatra varṣopagatasya tasmiṃ kaṭhina astīryamāṇa saṃmukhībhūtasya /
V03vinv08_u:55: apareṣām api pañcānāṃ pārivāsikasya paryuṣitaparivāsasya mānāpyacārikasya caritamānāpyasya śikṣādattakasya ca
V03vinv08_u:56: Kaṭhina-v 19. kātīnāṃ bhadanta naiva lābho nānuśaṃsaḥ paṃcānām upāliṃ adarśanāyotkṣiptakasya apratikarmaṇāyotkṣiptakasya apratinisṛṣṭe /
V03vinv08_u:57: pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣiptakasya anyatra varṣoṣitasya bhinne ca saṃghe adharme pākṣikasya
V03vinv08_u:59: Kaṭhina-v 20. saṃbahulā bhikṣavo janapadacārikāṃ carantaḥ corair muṣitās te 'nupūrveṇa śrāvastīm anuprāptā bhikṣubhir dṛṣṭāḥ svāgataṃ svāgataṃ āyuṣmantaḥ kaccit sukhacaryā /
V03vinv08_u:60: kīdṛśī āyuṣmantaḥ sukhacaryā corair muṣitāḥ smaḥ /
V03vinv08_u:61: asmākam āyuṣmantaḥ prabhūto lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ yadi kaṭhinam uddhriyate cīvarair yuṣmākaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kurma iti /
V03vinv08_u:62: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti bhagavān āha /
V03vinv08_u:63_0: tasmād anujānāmi corair muṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam uddhartavyaṃ evaṃ
V03vinv08_u:63_1: ca punar uddhartavyaṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣtavācikayā bhikṣūn
V03vinv08_u:63_2: samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam*
V03vinv08_u:64_0: Kaṭhina-v 21. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha yāvad evāsminn āvāse samagreṇa saṃghena kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:64_1: āstṛtaṃ saṃbahulāś ca bhikṣavaḥ corair muṣitā āgatāḥ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ
V03vinv08_u:64_2: kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghaś corair muṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:64_3: uddhared ity eṣā jñaptiḥ evaṃ ca karma kartavyam*
V03vinv08_u:66_0: Kaṭhina-v 22a. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha yāvad evāsminn āvāse samagreṇa saṃghena kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:66_1: āstṛtaṃ saṃbahulāś ca bhikṣavaś corair muṣitakā āgatās tat saṃghaś corair muṣitakānāṃ
V03vinv08_u:66_2: bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam uddharati yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate coramuṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām
V03vinv08_u:66_3: arthāya kaṭhinam uddharituṃ te tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ uddhṛtaṃ saṃghena coramuṣitakānāṃ
V03vinv08_u:66_4: bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinaṃ kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /

V03vinv08_u:173_1: bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasyaivaṃ bhavati
V03vinv08_u:173_2: na haiva pratyeṣyāmy nāpi cīvarakaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:175_0: Kaṭhina-v 61. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ
V03vinv08_u:175_1: bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti [Matsumura_229]
V03vinv08_u:175_2: sa tad ārabhate ārabdhaṃ cāsya naśyati tasya nāśanāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ //
V03vinv08_u:176: Kaṭhina-v 62. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:177: samagreṇa ca saṃghena kaṭhinam uddhṛtaṃ sa śṛṇoti samagreṇa saṃghena kaṭhinam uddhṛtam iti śrutvā cābhyanumodate sādhūddhṛtaṃ suṣṭhūddhṛtam iti /
V03vinv08_u:179: Kaṭhina-v 63. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:180: tasya tatra gatasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasya niṣṭhāpanāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ //
V03vinv08_u:181: yathāpi tatra gatasyety anena viśeṣeṇa niṣṭhāpanāntika uktaḥ evaṃ sanniṣṭhāpanāntikaḥ // 6 //
V03vinv08_u:184_0: Kaṭhina-v 64. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ
V03vinv08_u:184_1: vicikitsāsaṃtatir bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena kiṃ nu pratyeṣyāmi āhosvin na
V03vinv08_u:184_2: pratyeṣyāmīti tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasya
V03vinv08_u:185: yathā vicikitsāsantatir ity anena viśeṣeṇa niṣṭhāpanāntika uktaḥ //
V03vinv08_u:190: Kaṭhina-v 65. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati paryeṣaṇāya pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:191: tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasya niṣṭhāpanāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ
V03vinv08_u:192: paryeṣanāyety anena viśeṣeṇa pūrvavad aparā dvādaśikā : // //
V03vinv08_u:193: Kaṭhina-v 66. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati deśānuprekṣī apunarāgamanāya tasya prakramaṇāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ //
V03vinv08_u:194_0: Kaṭhina-v 67.i. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ
V03vinv08_u:194_1: vicikitsāsantati deśānuprekṣī bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati kin nu pratyeṣyāmi āhosvin na
V03vinv08_u:194_2: pratyeṣyāmīti tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasyaiva
